messages.missing_permissions: ❌  You don't have enough permissions to execute this command.
messages.embed_field1_value:
```!mk helpme - Shows all available commands.
!mk status - Shows bot's status. ```
messages.embed_field2_value:
```
!mk start - Starts the main process in the channel where the command is executed.
!mk stop - Stops the main process.

!mk enable (Epic/Humble/Mention) - Global command to enable diverse AutomatiK services.
!mk disable (Epic/Humble/Mention) - Global command to disable diverse AutomatiK services.

!mk mention (role) - Select which role will be mentioned in Automatik's messages. Example: '!mk mention @MyRole'.
!mk notify (name) (link) - Notify games from non-supported platforms manually.

!mk language ({}) - Change the language of the messages.```
